title: Team Aspire Red, Recruiting for season 6 Diamond+ LF TOP/MID
body:
Team Aspire red is a semi serious team, we are currently looking for a top laner and a mid laner you will be put under a trial basis lasting about a couple of days what we mainly look at is positivity and willingness to improve as a team.

IGN - Aspire Nubzy 

Requirements - 

- Able to play through the weekdays 6-7pm onwards
- Team Speak 
- Positive attitude is a must, not looking for salty negative players. If you happen to be this type of person don't bother messaging me
- Taking constructive criticism, always looking to improve as a team.
